Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Provides that tenants shall be offered the option of a one, two, three or four year renewal lease; repealer
Summary: Provides that tenants shall be offered the option of a one, two, three or four year renewal lease; repeals certain provisions relating to the increase in rent for such renewal leases.
LawCode: Amd §26-511, rpld §26-511 sub c ¶5-a, NYC Ad Cd; amd §10, rpld §10 sub (a-1), Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to the duration of renewal leases; and to repeal certain provisions of such laws relating to the increase in rent for such renewal leases
